DataDetPlcySstvDataCatg.name: DataDetPlcySstvDataCatg
DataDetPlcySstvDataCatg.description: Represents the sensitive data categories that the DataDetect scan policy is required to scan.

DataCategory.description: Sensitive data category associated with the scan policy.

DataDetectPolicyId.description: ID of the scan policy associated with the sensitive data category. This field is a relationship field.

Name.description: Name of the sensitive data category.
